mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Solves( team_id, token, challenge_id, user_id, flag ) VALUES ( #{team.id}, #{team.token}, #{challenge.id}, #{user.id}, #{flag} )
mapper.select: select Challenges.* from Solves, Challenges, Users where Solves.user_id = Users.id and Solves.challenge_id = Challenges.id and Users.id = #{id} order by -Solves.created_time
select Challenges.* from Solves, Challenges, Teams where Solves.team_id = Teams.id and Solves.challenge_id = Challenges.id and Teams.id = #{id} order by -Solves.created_time
select sum(Challenges.score) from Solves, Challenges, Users where Solves.user_id = Users.id and Solves.challenge_id = Challenges.id and Users.id = #{id}
select sum(Challenges.score) from Solves, Challenges, Teams where Solves.team_id = Teams.id and Solves.challenge_id = Challenges.id and Teams.id = #{id}
